name: Reaper
description: Hellfire Shotguns, the ghostly ability to become immune to damage, and the power to step between shadows make Reaper one of the deadliest beings on Earth.
base_of_operations: Los Angeles, California, United States of America

abilities.name: Hellfire Shotguns
abilities.description: Reaper tears enemies apart with twin shotguns.

abilities.name: Wraith Form
abilities.description: Reaper becomes a shadow for a short period of time. While in this form, he takes no damage and is able to pass through enemies, but cannot fire his weapons or use other abilities.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description: After marking a destination, Reaper disappears and reappears at that location.

abilities.name: The Reaping
abilities.description: Reaper collects souls from fallen enemies to replenish his health.

abilities.name: Death Blossom
abilities.description: In a blur of motion, Reaper empties both hellfire shotguns at breakneck speed, dealing massive damage to all nearby enemies.
